`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(n.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(n.li,{children:[`
`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:"Delhi, officially known as the National Capital Territory of Delhi (NCT), is a city and a union territory of India. It serves as the capital of India and is one of the largest and most populous cities in the country. Delhi is located in the northern part of India and is bordered by the state of Haryana on three sides and by Uttar Pradesh to the east."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-eedd84e4-537d-4c6e-a0dd-ffcff2c7521c.mdx",lineNumber:139,columnNumber:3},this),`
`]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-eedd84e4-537d-4c6e-a0dd-ffcff2c7521c.mdx",lineNumber:139,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(n.li,{children:[`
`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:"Delhi has a rich history dating back thousands of years, with evidence of settlements from the 6th century BCE. It has been the capital of several empires and dynasties, including the Maurya, Gupta, and Mughal empires. The city is known for its numerous historical monuments, including the Red Fort, Qutub Minar, Humayun's Tomb, and India Gate, which attract tourists from around the world."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-eedd84e4-537d-4c6e-a0dd-ffcff2c7521c.mdx",lineNumber:141,columnNumber:3},this),`
`]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-eedd84e4-537d-4c6e-a0dd-ffcff2c7521c.mdx",lineNumber:141,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(n.li,{children:[`
`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:"Today, Delhi is a major political, cultural, and commercial hub of India. It is divided into two parts: Old Delhi, which reflects the city's historical heritage with its narrow lanes, ancient bazaars, and Mughal-era monuments, and New Delhi, which serves as the capital's modern administrative center with wide avenues, government buildings, and diplomatic enclaves."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-eedd84e4-537d-4c6e-a0dd-ffcff2c7521c.mdx",lineNumber:143,columnNumber:3},this),`
`]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-eedd84e4-537d-4c6e-a0dd-ffcff2c7521c.mdx",lineNumber:143,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(n.li,{children:[`
`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:"Delhi is also known for its diverse culture, with a mix of different languages, cuisines, religions, and traditions. It is a melting pot of various cultures from across India, making it a vibrant and dynamic city."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-eedd84e4-537d-4c6e-a0dd-ffcff2c7521c.mdx",lineNumber:145,columnNumber:3},this),`

`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:"Overall, Delhi city remains a significant center of political, economic, and cultural activity in India, drawing visitors from around the world to experience its vibrant energy and historical heritage."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-eedd84e4-537d-4c6e-a0dd-ffcff2c7521c.mdx",lineNumber:149,columnNumber:1},this)]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-eedd84e4-537d-4c6e-a0dd-ffcff2c7521c.mdx",lineNumber:1,columnNumber:1},this)}function wr(c={}){let{wrapper:n}=c.components||{};return n?(0,o.jsxDEV)(n,Object.assign({},c,{children:(0,o.jsxDEV)(ke,c,void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-eedd84e4-537d-4c6e-a0dd-ffcff2c7521c.mdx"},this)}),void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-eedd84e4-537d-4c6e-a0dd-ffcff2c7521c.mdx"},this):ke(c)}var xr=wr;function Er(c,n,d){throw new Error("Expected "+(n?"component":"object")+" `"+c+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it."+(d?"\nIt\u2019s referenced in your code at `"+d+"` in `/Users/aliimam/Documents/ai/apps/web/src/content/gallery/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-eedd84e4-537d-4c6e-a0dd-ffcff2c7521c.mdx`":""))}return yr(jr);})();
